languages.text: "Ты пошел путем воина, жрец. Воину должно быть беспощадным, но речь не о беспощадности к врагу. Главное — беспощадность к себе!"
"You have gone the way of the warrior, Priest. A warrior must be ruthless — not toward the enemy, but toward himself!"
languages.original_text: "Ты пошел путем воина, жрец. Воину должно быть беспощадным, но речь не о беспощадности к врагу. Главное — беспощадность к себе!"

traits.locale_text: "You have gone the way of the warrior, Priest. A warrior must be ruthless — not toward the enemy, but toward himself!"
"You have gone the way of the warrior, Priest. A warrior must be ruthless — not toward the enemy, but toward himself!"
"You have gone the way of the warrior, Priest. A warrior must be ruthless — not toward the enemy, but toward himself!"
"You have gone the way of the warrior, Priest. A warrior must be ruthless — not toward the enemy, but toward himself!"

languages.text: “你踏上了战士的道路，神甫。战士必须无情，不仅仅对敌人无情，对自己也要无情！”
languages.original_text: "You have gone the way of the warrior, Priest. A warrior must be ruthless — not toward the enemy, but toward himself!"

traits.locale_text: “你踏上了战士的道路，祭司。战士必须无情，不仅仅对敌人无情，对自己也要无情！”

languages.text: « Vous sillonnez désormais la voie du guerrier, prêtre. Et un guerrier se doit d'être impitoyable, non pas envers l'ennemi, mais envers lui-même ! »
languages.original_text: "You have gone the way of the warrior, Priest. A warrior must be ruthless — not toward the enemy, but toward himself!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous sillonnez désormais la voie du guerrier, prêtre. Et un guerrier se doit d'être impitoyable, non pas envers l'ennemi, mais envers lui-même ! »

languages.text: «Ha emprendido el camino del guerrero, sacerdote. Un guerrero debe ser despiadado, ¡no solo con el enemigo sino también consigo mismo!».
languages.original_text: "You have gone the way of the warrior, Priest. A warrior must be ruthless — not toward the enemy, but toward himself!"

traits.locale_text: «Ha emprendido el camino del guerrero, sacerdote. Un guerrero debe ser despiadado, ¡no solo con el enemigo sino también consigo mismo!».

languages.text: 「司祭、戦士と同じ運命を歩んできたのだな。戦士は慈悲を――敵にかけはしない、己にかけるのだ！」
languages.original_text: "You have gone the way of the warrior, Priest. A warrior must be ruthless — not toward the enemy, but toward himself!"

traits.locale_text: 「司祭、戦士と同じ運命を歩んできたのだな。戦士は慈悲を――敵にかけはしない、己にかけるのだ！」

languages.text: "Ihr seid den Weg des Kriegers gegangen, Priester. Ein Krieger muss gnadenlos sein. Nicht dem Feind gegenüber, sondern sich selbst!"
languages.original_text: "You have gone the way of the warrior, Priest. A warrior must be ruthless — not toward the enemy, but toward himself!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid den Weg des Kriegers gegangen, Priester. Ein Krieger muss gnadenlos sein. Nicht dem Feind gegenüber, sondern sich selbst!"

languages.original_text: "You have gone the way of the warrior, Priest. A warrior must be ruthless — not toward the enemy, but toward himself!"

languages.text: "Tıpkı bir savaşçı gibi yaşadın Rahip. Savaşçı, acımasız olmalıdır... Fakat düşmana karşı değil, kendine karşı!"
languages.original_text: "You have gone the way of the warrior, Priest. A warrior must be ruthless — not toward the enemy, but toward himself!"

traits.locale_text: "Tıpkı bir savaşçı gibi yaşadın Rahip. Bir savaşçı acımasız olmalıdır fakat düşmana karşı değil, kendine karşı!"
